description: Roomy without being bulky, their Men’s Merino Sport Ultralite Hoodie is comfortable, stylish, and ready to take on the elements. It’s filled with practicality: features include reflective elements for when the light’s dim, two zippered pockets, and Merino Sport Ultralite panels that are breathable and temperature-regulating. If you’re about to hit the trail but know there might be a little weather, grab this hoodie for a some extra protection from the wind and rain.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport Ultralite Hoodie - Mens
